select count(*) from snap_post_detail where user_id = #{userId}

SELECT c.comment_no, c.post_id, c.writer_id, c.content, c.w_date, p.nickname, p.profile_img FROM snap_comment c LEFT JOIN snap_profile p ON c.writer_id = p.user_id WHERE c.post_id = #{postId} ORDER BY c.w_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO snap_post_detail (post_id, user_id, reg_date, imagename, height, weight, gender_style, content, item_code) VALUES (#{post_id}, #{user_id}, sysdate, #{imagename}, #{height}, #{weight}, #{gender}, #{content}, #{item_code})
mapper.select: SELECT d.post_id, d.user_id, d.reg_date, d.imagename, d.height, d.weight, d.gender_style, d.content, d.item_code, p.nickname, p.profile_img FROM snap_post_detail d LEFT JOIN snap_profile p ON d.user_id = p.user_id WHERE d.post_id = #{postId}
